# Preface {#sec-preface .unnumbered}

This book is a guide to the readability formulas available in the software product *Readability Studio*.

Chapters [-@sec-english-readability-tests], [-@sec-spanish-readability-tests],
and [-@sec-german-readability-tests] provide overviews for English, Spanish, and German tests, respectively.
